title: Kuznetsky Most 20
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, European, Fusion
description: Re-opened in 2015 with a new plant-based concept, this cafe is located inside a clothing store. Vegan except for honey. Offers cold-pressed juices, smoothies, healthy shots, nut milks, and kombucha made-in-house. Uses fresh organic produce.
